SEARCH
Package state

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
state.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
Edit, End, Play
public abstract class Phase extends Object
The abstract class Phase manages the states in the State pattern.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) GameEngine
    ge
    Contains a reference to the State of the GameEngine so that the state object can change the state of the GameEngine to transition between states.

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap(Connectivity p_connectivity, String[] p_commands)
      This method is used to load the Map in the Preload state.
      Parameters:
      p_connectivity - Connectivity object
      p_commands - is used to pass user command

    • viewMap

      public void viewMap(ArrayList<Continent> p_continentList, ArrayList<Country> p_countryList, ArrayList<Player> p_players)
      This method is used to display the map in an tabular manner.
      Parameters:
      p_continentList - refers to the list of continents.
      p_countryList - refers to the list of countries.
      p_players - refers to the list of players.
